price: andaj, lartësoje Zotin tënd duke e lavdëruar dhe bëhu prej atyre që i përulen Atij duke u falur!
arabic: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: fasabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika wakun mina al-sājidīna
